snippet.title: Mario + Rabbids Sparks of Hope: Cinematic World Premiere Trailer | #UbiForward
snippet.description:
Team up with Mario, Rabbid Peach, and their friends on a mission to save the galaxy! Mario + Rabbids® Sparks of Hope, coming 2022 on Nintendo Switch.

This video is available in audio description. #AudioDescription

Cursa, a mysterious and malevolent entity seeks out energy to further its nefarious plans, plunging the galaxy into chaos. Twisting the planets with its evil influence, it’s determined to consume all the energy of the Sparks, uncanny creatures formed by the fusion of Lumas & Rabbids, and destroy all who stand in its way. To bring order back to the galaxy and save the Sparks, Mario and friends team up with Rabbids heroes in a journey through mysterious and ever-surprising planets. 

Mario + Rabbids® Sparks of Hope will be available for Nintendo Switch in 2022.

LEARN MORE ON MARIO + RABBIDS SPARKS OF HOPE ON: www.mariorabbids.com 

FOLLOW US ON: 
Instagram: www.mariorabbids.com/instagram 
Facebook: www.mariorabbids.com/facebook
Twitter: www.mariorabbids.com/twitter
Forums: www.mariorabbids.com/forums
